ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] But They raised the Bar!
ygData.msgSnippet: I for one, still consider to hitting level 50 to be a major milestone - so congrats!  Hope to run into you one of these days. The only thing I can add about
ygData.messageBody:
I for one, still consider to hitting level 50 to be a major milestone - so
congrats! Hope to run into you one of these days.

The only thing I can add about Kedge - it's under-crowded nature makes it
next to impossible to get into a pickup group... But if you are 35+ and
have a good group together and are unhappy with your current locale, it's
always a great place to go..

Slyde Katzenjammer
40th Level Bard of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: "Rebecca Small" <macha_nabaob@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 09, 2000 10:08 AM
Subject: [eqbards] But They raised the Bar!


> Hail Fellow Tunesmiths,
>
> Kinda anti climatic now, but Ding! Welcome to L50.
> All I can say is get a group together and start on the first floor of
Kedge
> at L35 or so, and work your way through as you level up. The loot sucks,
but
> the respawn rate makes this about the fastest experience place we have
ever
> seen, and it's nearly always empty, even on Xegony.
>
> Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
> Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
> Excalibur, Xegony
>
